DOC.brief_title: Effects Relaxing Hydrotherapy Third Trimester Pregnancy

Clinically relevant regulation muscular tonus spastic hemiparetic patient due WATSU observe Chon ; significant reduction pain patient suffer fibromyalgia Faull . In respect pregnancy , WATSU narrate - yet scientifically evaluate - reduce pregnancy-related low back pain , relax hypertonic muscle include uterus , improve overall sense wellbeing deepen relationship mother unborn child . In addition , spontaneous cephalic version child breech presentation within 1 4 day night follow WATSU-treatments claim . According Pennick & Young , two three pregnant woman suffer pregnancy-related low back pain . Since population recommend refrain analgesic medication , potentially helpful intervention ought identify . The described effect WATSU muscle tone might interest case breech presentation . Tension uterus major influence success attempt external cephalic version . Although breech presentation occur 3-4 % pregnancy , complication threat mother well infant life . External cephalic version correct child 's position suggest although associated risk mother child . Breech presentation frequent medical indication cesarean section .
